name: FBLA SLC Submission
description: FBLA State Leadership Conference competition submission. A site for tourists to look search for popular attractions and can search for them based off of 5 different filters. Created with HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Bootstrap 5, JSON and SMTP JS

name: Calendar
description: Calendar app created with vanilla Javascript and highlights the current date

name: Hosting Plans
description: A project to calculate total cost for a selected plan using Bootstrap 5

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Simple tic-tac-toe game created with vanilla Javascript

name: Calculator
description: A simple fully functional calculator with common mathmatical operation created with vanilla Javascript

name: Quiz
description: A simple quiz to practice form submission and validation

name: Form Validation
description: Using RegEx to perform custom form validation

name: Portrait Transition
description: Practice CSS3 transitions and animations

name: Button Transition
description: Prace CSS3 transitions and animations

name: JSON
description: Practice for FBLA SLC competition submission

name: Canvas
description: Canvas drawing practice, the drawing is fully relative to a few starting parameters and will scale and move with the position

name: Career Tree
description: Made a website based off of which career chosen from a career tree

name: SVG
description: SVG drawing to practice the basics of SVG

name: Canvas Parallax
description: Canvas project with a parallax effect when the mouse is moved

name: Canvas Bubbles
description: Canvas project to spawn in bubbles that are animated using canvas and bounce of the walls changing colors and popping after a certain amount of time

name: Sine Wave
description: Sine wave animation using canvas

name: Tech Sounding Quotes
description: Website that provides quote that sound techy but actually aren't using a free API created in React JS

name: Weather API
description: Website created using React JS to search for a specific locations weather data using a weather API

name: User Management
description: A way to create an account, login to said account then be able to update the information. There's also an admin page where you can search for a specific user and delete them from the data base. Created in Node.js using Express js and MongoDB

name: PHP CRUD
description: PHP project using the CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functions to manipulate a MySQL database

name: Jokes API
description: Website created with React JS that uses a free API to retrieve a random joke at the press of a button

name: OMDB API
description: React JS website using a movie database API to search and display information about the movies searched
